    \lyquidity\xml\interfaces\IConvertable
    jump to top

    Package: Default
    Defines methods that convert the value of the implementing reference or value type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value.

    Methods

    GetTypeCode() : \lyquidity\xml\interfaces\TypeCode

    Returns the System.TypeCode for this instance.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\interfaces\TypeCodeThe enumerated constant that is the System.TypeCode of the class or value type that implements this interface.
    ToBoolean(\lyquidity\xml\interfaces\IFormatProvider $provider) : boolean

    Converts the value of this instance to an equivalent Boolean value using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

    Parameters
    NameTypeDescription
    $provider\lyquidity\xml\interfaces\IFormatProvider

    An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    booleanA Boolean value equivalent to the value of this instance.
